title: The Rivers of Alice v1.40 Android
description:
The Rivers of Alice is a graphic adventure that takes you through a world of riddles and characters inspired by the music and lyrics of vetusta morla. Whenever Alice falls asleep, she enters a world of fantasy where the player must help Alice face her fears like Sloth, Envy, or Lie.
Enjoy the leisurely game-play, beautiful graphics made using watercolors, ink and graphite, and the original game soundtrack composed by the indie-rock group, vetusta morla.

Features:
Beautiful and inspiring graphic adventure
Enchanting soundtrack by vetusta morla, Spanish indie-rock group
Fun and extended gaming experience
Included languages: English, French, German, Spanish, Portuguese and Italian.
If you like adventure games, good music, art and, above all, if you are not in a hurry... This is your game.

Required Android O/S : 2.2+
